name: Ulti
text: [On Play] If your Leader has the {Animal Kingdom Pirates} type, draw 1 card and trash 1 card from your hand. Then, play up to 1 Character card with 6000 power or less and no base effect from your trash.

effect.text: If your Leader has the {Animal Kingdom Pirates} type, draw 1 card and trash 1 card from your hand. Then, play up to 1 Character card with 6000 power or less and no base effect from your trash.
